name: Dynamic On-Chain Risk Underwriting (PAS)
description: Lumina evaluates dynamic risk parameters (smart contract risk, price volatility, gas spikes) and returns an instant premium quote. If accepted, Lumina deploys a MutualPoolV3 on Base.

risk_type.description: Category of risk to underwrite (e.g. smart_contract_exploit, price_volatility, gas_spike, oracle_failure)

target_contract.description: The on-chain contract address (Base) to evaluate and insure
